The undersigned Committ,,ee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles -I' Agreement of International Deve-lopment Association (the Association) hereby submits it recommendation pursuant to said section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant t: Mongolia (the Recipient) a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 12,600,000. The purpose of s; i credit is to use information -ind communication technologies to improve accessibili . transparency and efficiency of public services in Mongolia. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, ai of the purpose to which the proceecs of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project toward the financing of which l proceeds of such credit is to be apl lied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth i Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the econor i: development of the Recipient and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of li Recipient.

Accordingly, the Comn ittee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recomm nds said project for such assistance.
